full_description:
Realme DIZO Wireless Neckband Earphone

The Realme DIZO Wireless is amazing to look at. With the DIZO wireless neckband, you may listen to music or answer phone calls while exercising. This neckband produces deep bass and thundering sounds thanks to its built-in driver and Bass Boost+. Because this neckband's noise cancellation technology reduces ambient noise, you can converse with a loved one even when you're in a noisy location. Furthermore, because it is composed of TPE material and has a lightweight form factor, this neckband is easy to use all day.

Powerful Driver with Bass Boost+

The Realme DIZO Wireless neckband provides deeper and booming bass thanks to its huge 11.2mm unit and sophisticated Bass Boost+ technology. Every rhythm is like passionate drumming on the African grassland, beckoning your heart.

Playback Time of 17 Hours

The Realme DIZO Wireless neckband has an energy-efficient microprocessor that provides good performance while using less power. And, owing to its fast-charging technology, you can play for two hours on a 10-minute charge.

Noise Cancellation Technology

The Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) technology in the neckband helps to reduce ambient noise for improved speech quality during phone calls. In this manner, you may have uninterrupted talks with your loved ones.

Comfortable and Lightweight

Realme DIZO Wireless Neckband is designed with a 23.1 g lightweight body and skin-friendly TPE material, making it easy to use all day. Furthermore, because the neckband is comprised of flexible memory metal, the folding neckband bounces back to its original shape to fit securely around your neck.

IPX4 Water-Resistant

The Realme DIZO Wireless neckband is water-resistant to IPX4. It is impervious to water splashes from all directions. DIZO Wireless is your ideal buddy throughout daily workouts thanks to sweat-proof surface technology.

Easy to Control

Press once to play or pause/answer a call/ end a call. Double-press to next track, Triple-press to game mode. Press and hold for 1s decline an incoming call. Press and hold for 3s pairing mode. Press and hold for 10s rest to factory settings. It comes with a 6 months warranty.

Realme DIZO Wireless Active Bluetooth Neckband Earphone

Realme DIZO Wireless Active Neckband delivers crystal-clear audio with deep, rich bass. It has a powerful battery and a playback time of up to 23 hours, allowing you to listen to music continually without needing to frequently recharge it. Additionally, after just up to 10 minutes of charging, it can play up to 3 hours of music.

Powerful Driver with Bass Boost+

The Realme DIZO Wireless Active Neckband supports large PU+PEEK diaphragm drivers, this neckband offers sharp and detailed sound. It provides deeper and booming bass thanks to its huge 11.2mm unit and sophisticated Bass Boost+ technology.

Magnetic Buds with Elegant Design

Realme DIZO Wireless Active Neckband offers enhanced aesthetics and long-lasting performance. And, the memory metal in its strap ensures this neckband never loses its original shape in spite of folding it. In order to turn off this neckband, you can conveniently attach the magnetic buds and save the battery.

Environmental Noise Cancellation

Realme DIZO Wireless Active supports Environmental Noise Cancellation technology. It lets you easily be heard during calls even in noisy environments.

Sweat- and Splash-resistant Design

Realme DIZO Wireless Active has a sweat- and splash-resistant design. It can withstand splashes of sweat or water. So, you can exercise in the gym without worrying that sweat and water splashes would damage this sturdy neckband.

full_description:
Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone

The Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone is a high-quality audio device that features 11.2mm PU Plus PEEK Dynamic Drivers for crystal clear audio. With Bluetooth 5.2, this earphone offers good connectivity, and it has a massive 30-hour playback time, so you can enjoy your day without worrying about battery life. The Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone is also IPX4 Water Resistant, making it sweat- and splash-resistant, so you can easily take it to the gym. It has a sweat-proof design and offers deep bass, making it an ideal choice for fitness enthusiasts and music lovers alike. Although it is not foldable or collapsible, this neckband earphone offers other convenient features such as Power Indicator, Connection Status Indicator, and MEMS Technology. It is also compatible with Windows, Mac OS, and iOS and has a carrier frequency of 2402 - 2480. The Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone has a Neodym magnet type and dynamic driver type, and its controls include Play, Pause, Answer Call and Volume Control. It is monaural and has a sensitivity of 105 dBmW, an impedance of 28 ohms, and a signal-to-noise ratio of 97 dB. With a minimum frequency response of 20 Hz and a maximum frequency response of 20000 Hz, the Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone delivers exceptional sound quality. It also supports the SBC audio codec and Bluetooth profiles such as A2DP, AVRCP, and HFP. Powered by a lithium polymer battery with a capacity of 260 mAh, the Realme DIZO Wireless Dash Bluetooth Neckband Earphone has a battery life of up to 30 hours. Its power supply is 5 V DC, 600 mA, and the battery output is 3.7 V. With a microphone built-in, you can take phone calls without any hassle. Overall, this earphone is a great choice for anyone looking for high-quality audio, convenience, and durability.
